title: PSA "Better Nerf Irelia" -Morello
body:
She's obviously OP at 53% winrate, and its only gone up each patch!

http://new4.fjcdn.com/pictures/+better+nerf+irelia_024f12_4474460.jpg

replies.body:
Why is her head thing orange?

Why does she have a cat mouth?

Why is she apparently sitting in a grassy field?

Why is she in her PJs?

Why are the things on her hair yellow instead of white?

Why is she blonde all the sudden?

_I demand answers._

>

As silly as the image and context are, that's actually a pretty legit quote.
Slumber Party skin confirmed
Forty two?
second of all HOW DARE YOU

> [{quoted}](name=Hi lm Brad,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2gNEOLTb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-18T21:44:35.433+0000)
>
> second of all HOW DARE YOU

http://www.amightygirl.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/a-smart-girls-guide-knowing-what-say-patti-kelley-criswell-paperback-cover-art1-164x300.jpg
Better hug Irelia
Given that a good eighty percent of the champions in league are in dire need of a big hug, yeah, I can back this.

"LEAVE IRELIA ALONE!"

(If you get the reference, then you get my upvote)
Britney... is it really that old now?
seems like it its sad

Patch 4.21:

Better rape Warwick and Challenging smite.
Yea because getting point-and-click 100-0'd while suppressed by a 4000 HP Champion totally didn't suck the fun out of playing right?
Challenging smite on WW let you kill an ulting Tryndamere.
Killing Trynd with red smite was the only good thing that came out of that patch lmfao
Well I wasn't playing during that time, but I did hear about the cancer that Warwick brought.

First: nice name? you played legacy yet?
Second: it was like a fucking christmas present i had played warwick 1 in every 4 games, for the last half of season 4, i started testing preseason on PBE, laughed at the complaint threads about junglers because i had massive sustain, would start building trailblazers into devourer before switching it to challengers and then i'd gank and i'd sustain and i would be utterly unkillable. i spent so long being godlike it was terrifying... and then the nerfs happened at that point i was like K. still strong dough.
As soon as Rageblade is nerfed, she will be garbage because Trinity Force is an ADC Item now.
She actually got buffed more than nerfed. The meme comes from 3 nerfs in 3 patches in a row.
She's only doing well because the new Rageblade is simply insane.
{{champion:32}} Let me give you a hug.
